name: Cerberus
tag_list: investigators, private-detectives, investigations, intellectual-property, legal-services, tracing
overview:
Cerberus Investigations Limited is a Corporate and Intellectual Property Investigations company headquartered in London, England. Cerberus was founded in 2005.

The company conducts both Corporate and Intellectual Property investigations on behalf of brand owners businesses and law firms. Specifically these services include trademark in use verifications, anti-counterfeiting investigations, monitoring Intellectual Property infringement on eBay and covert domain name purchases.

The company also provides tracing investigations for private individuals.

Since 2005 Cerberus has head-quartered in Covent Garden, London and has a sister office in Istanbul, Turkey. The company operates worldwide for both Intellectual Property and Corporate investigations.
